official_title: Ultrasound Augmentation of Stereoscopic and Conventional Video for Laparoscopic Surgeries
inclusion_criteria:
1. Referred for laparoscopic cholecystectomy or liver ablation
2. Clinical indication for the use of laparoscopic ultrasound
3. Patient or an authorized guardian provides written consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 1 Year
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria: Patients with pacemaker or any other ICD (intra-cardiac device) which may interfere with electromagnetic tracking
